page.title: 20A clothing factory -2
page.content: Q. What time does it open.? A. 7.30.am Q. What time does it close.? A. 5.00.pm. Q. How long has it been open? A. Since June 1973. Q. What clothes do you make? A. Jumpers,tee-shirts, sleeping bags & dungarees for instance. Q. How many clothes do you make in a day and in a week ? A. 12 dozen in a day and 3600 dozen in a week. Q. How many machiners are there ? A. 170. Q. Are there any men or are they all women ? A. Men do cutting and work in the ware house Q. Where do you sell your clothes? A. Mainly Mothercare ,Tesco,British Home Stores'and Woolworths.
